ai-anya-e1202n6:1_1: Eventually, with five hundred women of the harem, Queen Anulā together with a hundred thousand women, and established in the presence of the Elder Nuns.
ai-anya-e1202n6:1_2: And the king’s nephew together with five hundred women, longing for them, he established them in the presence of the Teacher.
ai-anya-e1202n6:1_3: Then one day the King, after singing the Bodhisatta together with the Elders to the monastery,
ai-anya-e1202n6:1_4: and the king presented him with flowers to the Thera.
ai-anya-e1202n6:1_5: The elder had arranged with flowers on the ground covered with lamps, and he offered a big as a great flower.
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_0: The Kings asked the questions of the earth,
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_1: In this very spot, great king, there will be a very time for the Community.
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_2: And so it is for him that reason.
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_3: But took it (the Buddha) and the flowers fell into it.
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_4: But the king gave it to the Elder.
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_5: The elder, having worshipped the Great Collection with flowers at the place of worshipping,
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_6: The king asked him, “Why are you the earth?
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_7: In this place, great king, there will be no equal to the Buddha,
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_8: And so it is for him that reason.
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_10: Enough, great king, there is another work for you,
ai-anya-e1202n6:2_11: but your neighborhood was hard to perform.”
ai-anya-e1202n6:3_0: Then the King, reverend Sir, if I do not allow me,
ai-anya-e1202n6:3_1: Only the following twelve leagues I had brought to the King’s hands, and holding a stone for twelve-hundred million costly, the royal compound (also) Bhikkhus, placing it on the head, and established in the town called Pāṭaliputta, which was situated on the top of the Cetiya Ārāmas. Having taken aside a relicshold, heat leans drug, supervis the King of the Thūpa, after making an excellent relics for the Royal valuety of the Thūpa, the Soles, and set it with a hundred leagues through the relictions,
ai-anya-e1202n6:4_0: having driven out the districts, the Awakened One,
